amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds made available for Science under Title III of the Department of Energy's Energy Programs to be used in contravention of the Department of Energy Organization Act and addresses the need to increase programs that educate minorities in science, technology, engineering and mathematics.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount made available for the "Department of Energy; Energy Programs; Science" may be used in contravention of the Department of Energy Organization Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
